goal.ch: Teaching GoalThis course is designed to provide you with an overview of Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG). We will be focus on the role of corporations and institutional investors. It is your responsibility to read the assigned chapters as well as be prepared to discuss them in class. The success of this course will depend heavily on your preparation, participation and willingness to ask probing questions about the broader topic.This course is designed to provide you with an overview of Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG).
